description: Extract the most recent posts for any hashtags or locations on Instagram

outputDescription.profileName: Username of post author (only if available)
outputDescription.ownerId: Instagram unique ID of post author
outputDescription.likeCount: Number of likes the post received
outputDescription.commentCount: Number of comments the post received
outputDescription.views: Number of views, if the post contains a video
outputDescription.location: Where the photo was taken (only if available)
outputDescription.query: Hashtag (or location) that lead to the post
outputDescription.postVideo: Link to raw video file, if available, can contains more than one link if the data is available
outputDescription.videoThumbnail: Link to raw video thumbnail, can contains more than one link if the data is available
outputDescription.postImage: Link to raw post image, can contains more than one link if the data is available

spreadsheetUrl.label: Hashtag, location or spreasheet URL (?)
helpers: Enter either an Instagram hashtag beginning with # (like #iseefaces)
OR an Instagram location (like New York, New York)
OR a Google Spreadsheet URL (make sure your file is publicly available)
OR a CSV URL (make sure your file is publicly available)

sessionCookie.label: Your Instagram session cookie (sessionid) (?)
sessionCookie.helper: Paste here your sessionid cookie value. How?

columnName.label: Spreadsheet column name for Instagram hashtags
columnName.helper: If you're using a spreadsheet/CSV, tell us in which column you put the hashtags & locations (otherwise we'll use the first column)

numberOfLinesPerLaunch.label: Number of lines of your spreadsheet to process per launch (?)

maxPosts.label: Number of posts to scrape per hashtag
maxPosts.helper: All of them if empty (until hitting Instagram rate limit)
